title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8030.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8030.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 8 between

Main Street (CR 9) and the end of the overlap with Route 12 in the City of

Utica, Village of New Hartford and the Towns of Paris, New Hartford, Deerfield
and Marcy. (b) Route 12 between

Route 8 and Putnam Road in the Towns of Deerfield and Trenton. (c) Route 49. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 49 between Route 365 and Route 291 in the City of Rome and

Towns of Floyd and Marcy. (d) Route
365. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 365 between Thruway

Interchange 33 and Route 49 in the Towns of Verona and Westmoreland and the

City of Rome. (e) IR 90. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 90 between the Madison-Oneida county
line and the Oneida-Herkimer county line in the City of Utica, Village of

Whitesboro and Towns of Verona, Westmoreland, Whitestown and Marcy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8030.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
